text: Hey Tshering, we don’t support basic auth in workflows. If you’d like to verify that the requests are legitimate, you can check the “use request signature” box in the action configuration, and then update your endpoint to verify the request signature. More here: <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/workflows/how-do-i-use-webhooks-with-HubSpot-workflows#verify-request-signatures-in-workflow-webhooks>
